amendment.description: To require a strategy for United States security assistance to Mexico.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3376 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3376 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator McCormick to Amendment SA 3748. To require a strategy for United States security assistance to Mexico.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3376 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator McCormick to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3376 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
